actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE WeighBridge SET
		WB_Docket = '{{update_form.fieldState.WB_Docket.isVisible ? update_form.formData.WB_Docket : update_form.sourceData.WB_Docket}}',
		Date = '{{update_form.fieldState.Date.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Date : update_form.sourceData.Date}}',
    Rego = '{{update_form.fieldState.Rego.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Rego : update_form.sourceData.Rego}}',
		Supplier = '{{update_form.fieldState.Supplier.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Supplier : update_form.sourceData.Supplier}}',
		Operations = '{{update_form.fieldState.Operations.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Operations : update_form.sourceData.Operations}}',
		Coupe = '{{update_form.fieldState.Coupe.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Coupe : update_form.sourceData.Coupe}}',
		Harvestor = '{{update_form.fieldState.Harvestor.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Harvestor : update_form.sourceData.Harvestor}}',
		Gross = '{{update_form.fieldState.Gross.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Gross : update_form.sourceData.Gross}}',
		Tare = '{{update_form.fieldState.Tare.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Tare : update_form.sourceData.Tare}}',
		GMT = '{{update_form.fieldState.GMT.isVisible ? update_form.formData.GMT : update_form.sourceData.GMT}}',
		Grade = '{{update_form.fieldState.Grade.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Grade : update_form.sourceData.Grade}}'
  WHERE Docket = {{data_table.selectedRow.Docket}};
